summary: Tested all features from the redesign: My Lessons card redesign, font size increases, Google Calendar integration, ICS generation, and UI interactions. All features verified working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from card modernize iteration verified working. Google Calendar OAuth requires credentials to be configured (GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_SECRET). ICS file generation fully functional for all providers.

details.serif_titles: Cards use Crimson Text serif font for titles
details.no_gradient_bar: Cards have clean white background without gradient bar at top
details.tag_pills_with_icons: 3 tag pills found per card (age group, duration, theme) with icons
details.amber_scripture_passages: Scripture passages display in amber-700 color
details.grid_and_list_views: Both grid (3 columns) and list view modes work correctly
details.favorite_toggle: Heart/star button toggles correctly on cards

details.lesson_flow_sidebar: Uses text-xs (0.75rem) instead of text-[10px] - LARGER
details.interactive_tools_buttons: Uses text-sm (0.875rem) instead of text-xs - LARGER

details.menu_items: Mobile menu items use text-base (1rem) for better readability

details.status_endpoint: Returns connected=false, configured=false with message about missing credentials
details.create_event: Event creation endpoint ready (requires OAuth connection)
details.note: Google Calendar integration REQUIRES GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_SECRET to be configured in backend/.env for full functionality

details.google_calendar: Generates valid ICS content with BEGIN:VCALENDAR/END:VCALENDAR

details.title: Displayed with serif font
details.tags: Age group, duration, theme tags with icons
details.section_count: Number of sections shown in footer

api_endpoints_tested.notes: Generates valid ICS files for all providers
Returns lesson list with all required fields
